info.task: read information about grid cell containing link
info.title: Read information about a grid cell containing a link in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstLinkedCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third cell of the second row in the grid

user: With focus on a cell containing a link in the grid, read information about the cell.
instructions.raw: With focus on a cell containing a link in the grid, read information about the cell.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 2) are conveyed
